DEFECT.DESCRIPTION:
Potential overflow using expression 'hpclrt->rgcv[icv]' PREFAST_NEWLINE Buffer accessed is _clrt::rgcv PREFAST_NEWLINE Buffer is of length 64 elements (4 bytes/element) [size of field] PREFAST_NEWLINE Accessing the element (4 bytes/element) at element offset icv`21 PREFAST_NEWLINE
PREFAST_NEWLINE Values of variables: PREFAST_NEWLINE Pointer hpclrt is at offset 0 bytes from the start of hpclrt PREFAST_NEWLINE icv = icv`21 PREFAST_NEWLINE
PREFAST_NEWLINE where PREFAST_NEWLINE icv`21 >= 0 PREFAST_NEWLINE
PREFAST_NEWLINE Overrun access occurs when PREFAST_NEWLINE icv`21 >= 64 PREFAST_NEWLINE
